subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After dodging the media of late, Real's coach, José Mourinho, virtually conceded the title following his team's goalless draw Saturday in Pamplona, against the club at the bottom of the standings, Osasuna.
snippet: After dodging the media of late, Real's coach, José Mourinho, virtually conceded the title following his team's goalless draw Saturday in Pamplona, against the club at the bottom of the standings, Osasuna.
